notuptodatemessage:
App version is not up-to-date, please update the app.

Changelog:
-------------------------
* Optimized Player
* Added Patch Script
* Improved UI for tablet
* Added Rounded corner to player
changelog:
Changelog:
-------------------------
* Added resume player after closing device feature (Supported for few devices)
* Improved Notice delivery system
* Fixed keep eye feature upcoming animes
* Added flexible update support
* Default dark theme and added theme switcher in my stuff
* Added haptics
* Added copy anime name from title window feature
